introduction.title: About Me
introduction.description: I am a Finance postgraduate with extensive experience in business and technology consulting. Throughout my career, I've had the privilege of working with clients in over 50 countries, helping them transform their businesses through strategic initiatives and technology implementations. My passion lies in creating human-centered solutions that drive real business value. Outside of work, I enjoy mentoring young entrepreneurs and contributing to social innovation projects.

biography.title: Who I Am
paragraphs: I am a Finance postgraduate with over 25 years of experience in the Banking, Financial Services, and Technology sectors. My career has taken me across more than 50 countries, where I've had the privilege of working with diverse teams and clients on transformative projects.

As a business and technology consultant, I specialize in bridging the gap between strategic business goals and technological implementation. My expertise lies in understanding complex business challenges and creating human-centered solutions that deliver measurable value.

Beyond my professional work, I am passionate about mentoring young entrepreneurs and contributing to social innovation initiatives. I believe in the power of knowledge sharing and community building to create sustainable positive impact.
